treatment-md.title: Zygaenoprocris eberti Alberti 1968
treatment-md.article-title: Application of two molecular approaches (use of sex attractants and DNA barcoding) allowed to rediscover Zygaenoprocris eberti (Alberti, 1968) (Lepidoptera, Zygaenidae, Procridinae), hitherto known only from the female holotype
